Classes

class  Process
 Defines the data structures to keep track of the execution environment of a user program. More...

Detailed Description

A process keeps track of the resources used by a running Nachos program.

The resources considered are the memory (addrspace.h), the processor (thread.h), the open files, the statistics, ...
